pubs.name: The Old Fire Station
pubs.desc: Nightspot in old fire station for eclectic live music and club nights, plus student union events.

pubs.name: Inferno
pubs.desc: Split-level bar with stripped flooring, sofas, a pool table and a beer garden plus diner-style fare.

pubs.name: Bomo Cafe Bar
pubs.desc: Bomo Cafe Bar & Bunker set in a relaxed, rustic orangery style cafe bar & terrace situated over 3 floors at this cuturally historic building

pubs.name: The Christopher Creeke
pubs.desc: A modern Wetherspoon's pub with basic decor, dark patterned carpets, real ales, ciders and pub grub.
